video:video.video:title: TechNet Radio: NAP Deployment from a Customer Perspective
video:video.video:description: Hear Microsoft customers talk about how they deployed Network Access Protection (NAP) within their organizations. In this TechNet Radio session, Kevin Remde and Jeff Sigman talk with Chris Boscolo&#8230;

video:video.video:title: TechNet Radio: Microsoft Forefront Codename Stirling Overview (Part 2 of 2)
video:video.video:description: In the second part of our overview on Microsoft Forefront codename “Stirling,” we cover the next-generation versions of Forefront Client Security, Forefront Security for Exchange Server, Forefront&#8230;

video:video.video:title: TechNet Radio: Gearing up for Tech Ed 2007: An interview with Brian Marble and Kathy Visser-May
video:video.video:description: On this week’s TechNet Radio, we talk with Brian Marble and Kathy Visser-May about what to look for in Tech Ed 2007. Tech Ed 2007 is being held June 4-8 in Orlando, Florida. Listen in to hear&#8230;

video:video.video:title: TechNet Radio: Community Corner: an interview with Dan Stolts on Windows Server Longhorn (Windows
TechNet Radio - Community Corner: an interview with MVP Andy Malone on Windows Server &quot;Longhorn
video:video.video:description: New MVP Andy Malone talks with John Weston about Windows Server &quot;Longhorn&quot; (now Windows Server 2008). Andy is a technical trainer as well as the Managing Director of Quality Training Ltd.&#8230;
